participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, loves exploring new cultures and cuisines while enjoying the finer things in life.
participant_1.background: i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i've been traveling the world for a years. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, enjoys expressing herself through music and language, always eager to learn.
participant_2.background: i am a musician. i also study languages. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish.
